targets.rawSql: SELECT Version[1] FROM (SELECT regexp_matches(VERSION(), '(MatrixDB[^)]*)') AS Version) A;

SELECT
  state AS "time",
  state
FROM ${cluster}.segstate
ORDER BY 1
SELECT COUNT(sess_id)-1 AS "Connection(s)" FROM pg_catalog.pg_stat_activity
SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM now() - pg_postmaster_start_time())::bigint AS "MatrixDB"

SELECT
  uptime AS "time",
  uptime AS "OS Uptime"
FROM ${cluster}.os_uptime
ORDER BY 1

WITH org(t, o, u, s, w, a) AS (
    SELECT
      $__timeGroupAlias(ts,$__interval),
      avg((metrics->>'usage_guest')::real + (metrics->>'usage_guest_nice')::real + (metrics->>'usage_steal')::real),
      avg((metrics->>'usage_user')::real + (metrics->>'usage_nice')::real),
      avg((metrics->>'usage_system')::real + (metrics->>'usage_irq')::real + (metrics->>'usage_softirq')::real),
      avg((metrics->>'usage_iowait')::real),
      avg(100 - (metrics->>'usage_idle')::real)
    FROM ${cluster}.system
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(ts) AND
      category = 'cpu' AND
      device = 'cpu-total' AND
      host IN ($host)
    GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT t AS "time"
  , o AS "Other"
  , s AS "System"
  , u AS "User"
  , w AS "IOWait"
  , a As "Total"
FROM org
WHERE t <> (SELECT max(t) FROM org)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  ts AS "time",
  id,
  state
FROM ${cluster}.segdetails
ORDER BY 1

WITH org(t, u, b, c) AS (
    SELECT
      $__timeGroupAlias(ts,$__interval),
      avg(((metrics->>'total')::bigint - (metrics->>'free')::bigint - COALESCE((metrics->>'buffered')::bigint, 0) - COALESCE((metrics->>'cached')::bigint, 0) - COALESCE((metrics->>'sreclaimable')::bigint, 0)) / (metrics->>'total')::real * 100) AS "Used",
      avg(COALESCE((metrics->>'buffered')::bigint, 0) / (metrics->>'total')::real * 100) AS "Buff",
      avg((COALESCE((metrics->>'cached')::bigint, 0) + COALESCE((metrics->>'sreclaimable')::bigint, 0)) / (metrics->>'total')::real * 100) AS "Cache"
    FROM ${cluster}.system
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(ts) AND
      category = 'mem' AND
      host IN ($host)
    GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT t AS "time"
  , u AS "Used"
  , b AS "Buff"
  , c AS "Cache"
FROM org
WHERE t <> (SELECT max(t) FROM org)
ORDER BY 1
;

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  100 * free_bytes / total_bytes AS "free_pct"
FROM ${cluster}.master_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  free_bytes AS "free_bytes"
FROM ${cluster}.master_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  100 * (total_bytes - free_bytes) / total_bytes AS "used_pct"
FROM ${cluster}.master_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  total_bytes - free_bytes AS "used_bytes"
FROM ${cluster}.master_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  100 * free_bytes / total_bytes AS "free_pct"
FROM ${cluster}.seg_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  free_bytes
FROM ${cluster}.seg_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  100 * (total_bytes - free_bytes) / total_bytes AS "used_pct"
FROM ${cluster}.seg_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  total_bytes - free_bytes AS "used_bytes"
FROM ${cluster}.seg_disk_usage
ORDER BY 1

WITH org(t, h, m) AS (
  SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(ts,$__interval)
    , host
    , metrics
  FROM ${cluster}.system s
  WHERE $__timeFilter(ts)
    AND category = 'system'
    AND host IN ($host)
),
per_host_per_t(t, l1, l5, l15) AS (
    SELECT t
      , avg((m->>'load1')::float)
      , avg((m->>'load5')::float)
      , avg((m->>'load15')::float)
    FROM org
    WHERE t <> (SELECT max(t) FROM org)
    GROUP BY t, h
)
SELECT t AS "time", avg(l1) AS "Load1", avg(l5) AS "Load5", avg(l15) AS "Load15"
FROM per_host_per_t
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

WITH org(t, h, d, m) AS (
    SELECT
      $__timeGroupAlias(ts, $__interval),
      host,
      device, -- diskio has device name
      metrics
    FROM ${cluster}.system
    WHERE $__timeFilter(ts)
      AND category = 'diskio'
      AND host IN ($host)
),
per_tag_per_t(t, h, d, rb, wb) AS (
    SELECT
      t, h, d,
      min(m->>'read_bytes')::bigint,
      min(m->>'write_bytes')::bigint
    FROM org
    GROUP BY t, h, d
),
delta(t, dt, drb, dwb, mint) AS (
    SELECT t,
      t - lag(t, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t) AS dt,
      GREATEST(rb - lag(rb, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t), 0) AS drb,
      GREATEST(wb - lag(wb, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t), 0) AS dwb,
      first_value(t) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t) AS mint
    FROM per_tag_per_t
),
filter(t, dt, drb, dwb) AS (
    SELECT t, dt, drb, dwb
    FROM delta
    WHERE dt > 0
      AND t <> mint
)
SELECT t AS "time"
  , sum(drb/dt)::bigint AS "Read"
  , sum(dwb/dt)::bigint AS "Write"
FROM filter
WHERE t <> (SELECT max(t) FROM filter)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

SELECT
  logtime::timestamp with time zone AS "time",
  replace(logsegment, 'seg', '') AS logsegment,
  logseverity,
  logmessage,
  loguser,
  logdatabase,
  loghost
FROM matrixmgr_internal.local_logs
WHERE
  logseverity IN ($severity_level_var)
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 100

WITH org(t, h, d, m) AS (
    SELECT
      $__timeGroupAlias(ts, $__interval),
      host,
      device, -- diskio has device name
      metrics
    FROM ${cluster}.system
    WHERE $__timeFilter(ts)
      AND category = 'net'
      AND device <> 'all'
      AND host IN ($host)
),
per_tag_per_t(t, h, d, rb, wb) AS (
    SELECT
      t, h, d,
      min(m->>'bytes_recv')::bigint,
      min(m->>'bytes_sent')::bigint
    FROM org
    GROUP BY t, h, d
),
delta(t, dt, drb, dwb, mint) AS (
    SELECT t,
      t - lag(t, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t) AS dt,
      GREATEST(rb - lag(rb, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t), 0) AS drb,
      GREATEST(wb - lag(wb, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t), 0) AS dwb,
      first_value(t) OVER (PARTITION BY h, d ORDER BY t) AS mint
    FROM per_tag_per_t
),
filter(t, dt, drb, dwb) AS (
    SELECT t, dt, drb, dwb
    FROM delta
    WHERE dt > 0
      AND t <> mint
)
SELECT t AS "time"
  , sum(drb/dt)::bigint AS "Recv"
  , sum(dwb/dt)::bigint AS "Send"
FROM filter
WHERE t <> (SELECT max(t) FROM filter)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
;

WITH org(t, h, m) AS (
    SELECT
      $__timeGroupAlias(ts, $__interval),
      host,
      metrics
    FROM ${cluster}.system
    WHERE $__timeFilter(ts)
      AND category = 'processes'
      AND host IN ($host)
),
per_tag_per_t(t, total, blocked, paging, running, sleeping, idle) AS (
    SELECT
      t,
      avg((m->>'total')::bigint),
      avg((m->>'blocked')::bigint),
      avg((m->>'paging')::bigint),
      avg((m->>'running')::bigint),
      avg((m->>'sleeping')::bigint),
      avg((m->>'idle')::bigint)
    FROM org
    GROUP BY t, h
)
SELECT
  t AS "time",
  sum(total - blocked - paging - running - sleeping - idle) AS "Other",
  sum(blocked + paging) AS "Blocked",
  sum(sleeping + idle) AS "Sleep",
  sum(running) AS "Running"
FROM per_tag_per_t
WHERE t <> (SELECT max(t) FROM per_tag_per_t)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

list.definition:
SELECT n.nspname FROM pg_namespace n
INNER JOIN pg_class c
ON c.relnamespace = n.oid
AND c.relname = 'matrix_manager_config'
list.label: Select Cluster to View
list.name: cluster
list.query:
SELECT n.nspname FROM pg_namespace n
INNER JOIN pg_class c
ON c.relnamespace = n.oid
AND c.relname = 'matrix_manager_config'

list.definition: SELECT hostname FROM gp_segment_configuration GROUP BY hostname ORDER BY min(content)
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT hostname FROM gp_segment_configuration GROUP BY hostname ORDER BY min(content)
